name: Dafen Oil Painting Village: An Immersive Reality
description: Dafen Oil Painting Village: An Immersive Reality is a virtual reality experience about global creation, emerging technologies, and the future of media.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better. Storage: 2300 MB available space Sound Card: N/A Additional Notes: If you can run an HTC Vive, you can use this program
